items.sentence: This is the most fun I\'ve had in a long time.
Tom got into the driver\'s seat and drove off.
My children have just finished their homework.
My father is two years younger than my mother.
My father used to read books to me at bedtime.
My grandmother really likes watching TV a lot.
How did Tom know Mary wouldn\'t be here today?
How did Tom know which book Mary hadn\'t read?
How did you know Tom wasn\'t going to be here?
Tom might be able to convince Mary to do that.
